00036 int FirstDerivativeFourthOrderCentral(
00037                                         double  *Df,  
00038                                         double  *f,   
00040                                         int     dir,  
00041                                         int     bias, 
00043                                         void    *s,   
00044                                         void    *m    
00045                                      )
00046 {
00047   SolverContext *solver = (SolverContext*) s;
00048   int           i, j, v;
00049 
00050   int ghosts = solver->ghosts;
00051   int ndims  = solver->ndims;
00052   int nvars  = solver->nvars;
00053   int *dim   = solver->dim_local;
00054 
00055 
00056   if ((!Df) || (!f)) {
00057     fprintf(stderr, "Error in FirstDerivativeFourthOrder(): input arrays not allocated.\n");
00058     return(1);
00059   }
00060 
00061   static double one_twelve = 1.0/12.0;
00062 
00063   /* create index and bounds for the outer loop, i.e., to loop over all 1D lines along
00064      dimension "dir"                                                                    */
00065   int indexC[ndims], index_outer[ndims], bounds_outer[ndims];
00066   _ArrayCopy1D_(dim,bounds_outer,ndims); bounds_outer[dir] =  1;
00067   int N_outer; _ArrayProduct1D_(bounds_outer,ndims,N_outer);
00068 
00069 #pragma omp parallel for schedule(auto) default(shared) private(i,j,v,index_outer,indexC)
00070   for (j=0; j<N_outer; j++) {
00071     _ArrayIndexnD_(ndims,j,bounds_outer,index_outer,0);
00072     _ArrayCopy1D_(index_outer,indexC,ndims);
00073     /* left boundary */
00074     for (i = -ghosts; i < -ghosts+1; i++) {
00075       int     qC, qp1, qp2, qp3, qp4;
00076       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00077       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp1);
00078       indexC[dir] = i+2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp2);
00079       indexC[dir] = i+3; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp3);
00080       indexC[dir] = i+4; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp4);
00081       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  
00082         Df[qC*nvars+v] = (-25*f[qC*nvars+v]+48*f[qp1*nvars+v]-36*f[qp2*nvars+v]+16*f[qp3*nvars+v]-3*f[qp4*nvars+v])*one_twelve;
00083     }
00084     for (i = -ghosts+1; i < -ghosts+2; i++) {
00085       int qC, qm1, qp1, qp2, qp3;
00086       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm1);
00087       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00088       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp1);
00089       indexC[dir] = i+2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp2);
00090       indexC[dir] = i+3; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp3);
00091       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  
00092         Df[qC*nvars+v] = (-3*f[qm1*nvars+v]-10*f[qC*nvars+v]+18*f[qp1*nvars+v]-6*f[qp2*nvars+v]+f[qp3*nvars+v])*one_twelve;
00093     }
00094     /* interior */
00095     for (i = -ghosts+2; i < dim[dir]+ghosts-2; i++) {
00096       int qC, qm1, qm2, qp1, qp2;
00097       indexC[dir] = i-2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm2);
00098       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm1);
00099       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00100       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp1);
00101       indexC[dir] = i+2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp2);
00102       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  
00103         Df[qC*nvars+v] = (f[qm2*nvars+v]-8*f[qm1*nvars+v]+8*f[qp1*nvars+v]-f[qp2*nvars+v])*one_twelve;
00104     }
00105     /* right boundary */
00106     for (i = dim[dir]+ghosts-2; i < dim[dir]+ghosts-1; i++) {
00107       int qC, qm3, qm2, qm1, qp1;
00108       indexC[dir] = i-3; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm3);
00109       indexC[dir] = i-2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm2);
00110       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm1);
00111       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00112       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qp1);
00113       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  
00114         Df[qC*nvars+v] = (-f[qm3*nvars+v]+6*f[qm2*nvars+v]-18*f[qm1*nvars+v]+10*f[qC*nvars+v]+3*f[qp1*nvars+v])*one_twelve;
00115     }
00116     for (i = dim[dir]+ghosts-1; i < dim[dir]+ghosts; i++) {
00117       int qC, qm4, qm3, qm2, qm1;
00118       indexC[dir] = i-4; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm4);
00119       indexC[dir] = i-3; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm3);
00120       indexC[dir] = i-2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm2);
00121       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qm1);
00122       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00123       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  
00124         Df[qC*nvars+v] = (3*f[qm4*nvars+v]-16*f[qm3*nvars+v]+36*f[qm2*nvars+v]-48*f[qm1*nvars+v]+25*f[qC*nvars+v])*one_twelve;
00125     }
00126   }
00127   
00128   return(0);
00129 }
